casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Heft, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Heft, 130 Ohio St.3d 270, 2011-Ohio-5714.]

(No. 2010-1228 Submitted November 1, 2011 Decided November 9, 2011.) William T. Goslee, Logan County Prosecuting Attorney, and Daniel LaRoche, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Brian L. Heft, pro se.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Lester, 130 Ohio St.3d 303, 2011-Ohio-5204, 958 N.E.2d 142.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. Lanzinger, J., dissents.
